text: @ScottMorrisonMP UNBELIEVABLE. We face the worst week of #coronavirus and you tweet this: taxpayer bail outs of business with no work to do because people #StayAtHome. You have bungled this from Day 1, squandered our opportunity to protect Australians. Now we brace for devastating consequences.
